bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLIV (Nos 3151-3208) with contributions by V. Brown, F.C. Philips, J.W. Shumaker, A. Swiderek

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Bowman A.K., M.W. Haslam, J.C. Shelton and J.D. Thomas, with contributions by V. Brown, F.C. Philips, J.W. Shumaker, A. Swiderek, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLIV (Nos 3151-3208). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 62.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1976, 8°, xvi-223 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par E.K. Borthwick, JHS 97 (1977) p. 191. - G. Foti Talamanca, Iura 28 (1977) pp. 155-162. - J. Irigoin, REG 91 (1978) pp. 210-211. - W. Luppe, Gnomon 49 (1977) pp. 737-743. - J. O'Callaghan, Orientalia N.S., 48 (1979) p. 147. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 51 (1976) No. 102, pp. 349-355. - Jean A. Straus, BibO 44 (1987) coll. 150-153.- S. Votto, StPap 17 (1978) pp. 67-68. - H.J. Wolff, ZSav 94 (1977) pp. 374-377.
Bowman Haslam Shelton Thomas Brown Philips Shumaker Swiderek
